definition: zither or guzheng/large zither with 13 to 25 strings, developed from guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] during Tang and Song times
guzheng or long zither/long zither with 13 to 16 strings, developed from guqin 古琴 during Tang and Song times/Japanese koto

sentences.english: From wulumuqi , to be adept in flute and zither playing.
sentences.chinese: 来自乌鲁木，擅长长笛和古筝的演奏。

sentences.english: Daming and Lingling can play the zither, too.
sentences.chinese: 大明和玲玲也会弹古筝。

sentences.english: Music is my hobby, I'm good at zheng and practice everyday.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢音乐，擅长的乐器是古筝，每天都要练习。

sentences.english: Hand Carved Nanmu Guzheng Landscape Style.
sentences.chinese: 金丝楠木山水雕刻古筝。

sentences.english: Yuzhouchangwan is one of the famous Zheng music, being widely circulated in China.
sentences.chinese: 《渔舟唱晚》是我国流传甚广的著名古筝曲。

sentences.english: Art of the Chinese zither has its centuries-old history.
sentences.chinese: 中国古筝艺术有着悠久的历史传统。

sentences.english: North View Primary School strives to be the Centre of Excellence for Guzheng in the North Zone.
sentences.chinese: 德贤小学力争成为北区古筝卓越中心。

sentences.english: It’s sort of like a zither, but Latvian.
sentences.chinese: 就像古筝似的，但是拉脱维亚式的。

sentences.english: Guzheng, also called Chinese zither, is one of the oldest Chinese musical plucking instruments.
sentences.chinese: 筝，又称为古筝，是中国最古老的弹拨乐器之一。

sentences.english: From Fanyu, like to play flute and zither.
sentences.chinese: 来自番禺，爱好长笛和古筝演奏。

sentences.english: Guzheng is one of the oldest folk musical instruments in China.
sentences.chinese: 古筝是我国最古老的民族乐器之一。

sentences.english: Body rhythm plays an important role in Zither performance, learning and teaching.
sentences.chinese: 体态律动对古筝演奏及教学有着重要作用。

sentences.english: Ms. Yuan Sha and her students held a Guzheng concert at our Concert Hall tonight.
sentences.chinese: “袁莎古筝师生音乐会”今晚在学院音乐厅举行。

sentences.english: For no reasons the gorgeous Zither has fifty strings.
sentences.chinese: 为没有原因华美的古筝有五十串。

sentences.english: Very like flute , and to be good at zither.
sentences.chinese: 非常喜欢长笛，还擅长古筝演奏。

sentences.english: From hangzhou , like to play flute and zither.
sentences.chinese: 来自杭州，擅长长笛和古筝演奏。

definition: guqin or qin, a long zither with seven strings, plucked with the fingers
hulusi, aka cucurbit flute (a kind of free reed wind instrument)
pipa, Chinese lute, with 4 strings, a large pear-shaped body and a fretted fingerboard
guzheng or long zither/long zither with 13 to 16 strings, developed from guqin 古琴 during Tang and Song times/Japanese koto
